text_block_list.text:
Haaaa, haaa, haa……! 
……~~~~!!
text_block_list.name: Daring Heart

text_block_list.text:
(I lost! I lost, I lost……I lost!! Physically 
and mentally, even though I trained that hard!!)
text_block_list.name: Daring Heart

text_block_list.text: (I was sure I didn't neglect anything! But still……!! ……!!)
text_block_list.name: Daring Heart

text_block_list.text: Kraft!!
text_block_list.name: Daring Heart

text_block_list.text:
……hey, Kraft. Tell me. 
How are……you this strong?
text_block_list.name: Daring Heart

text_block_list.text: Eh……?
text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft

text_block_list.text:
I was sure that I had prepared perfectly. To win 
against you in the race today, I did everything I could.
text_block_list.name: Daring Heart

text_block_list.text: But in the end I placed 2nd……and even then――
text_block_list.name: Daring Heart

text_block_list.text:
Honestly, right now, from the bottom of my heart. 
Even though it's frustrating, even though I don't 
want to admit it――even then 『You were stronger』.
text_block_list.name: Daring Heart

text_block_list.text:
Kraft. ……How? 
Just what is it……that's the source of your strength?
text_block_list.name: Daring Heart

text_block_list.text:
I don't really know if this will be an answer, but…… 
You see, I wanted to link it all together, that's why I run.
text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft

text_block_list.text:
The senpais I admired who ran for the Tiara. 
And……a path that I, that only my legs could run.
text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft

text_block_list.text:
By doing that, and leaving behind a run of my 
own, once again……that someone would be inspired, 
and that I wanted to inspire someone.
text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft

text_block_list.text:
Just like they connected it all, I wanted to connect it as well. 
That feeling……is what gave both of my legs so much strength.
text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft

text_block_list.text: ……I see. So that's how it was――
text_block_list.name: Daring Heart

text_block_list.text:
(Up until now, I gave my all just to win…… 
but, you were completely different)
text_block_list.name: Daring Heart

text_block_list.text:
(You were aiming for something much bigger, the place 
you were aiming for was higher. ……that's what it means)
text_block_list.name: Daring Heart

text_block_list.text:
Kraft. 
……Shake my hand, OK?
text_block_list.name: Daring Heart

text_block_list.text:
It was a wonderful run. 
I truly admire you.
text_block_list.name: Daring Heart

text_block_list.text: ――!! Heart-san……
text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft

text_block_list.text:
Fufuu. I thought this the first time too, but…… 
your hands are very warm. Just like the sun.
text_block_list.name: Daring Heart

text_block_list.text: (Rhein Kraft. Someday will I……be able to become like you?)
text_block_list.name: Daring Heart

text_block_list.text:
(Will I become stronger, and then. 
――Will I be able to create that link too?)
text_block_list.name: Daring Heart

text_block_list.text:
No. ……I will become an Uma Musume like that. 
Someday, for certain――
text_block_list.name: Daring Heart

text_block_list.text:
In this way, Rhein Kraft won the 『NHK Mile Cup』―― 
being the first to achieve this unorthodox double crown. 
And obtaining the title of 『Generation's Fastest』.

Congratulations, Rhein Kraft. 
It was a magnificent run. ……Truly.
text_block_list.name: Cesario

text_block_list.text: Next――it's my turn.
text_block_list.name: Cesario
